Actions.Name: Poison Spore
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage and is poisoned. Poisoned foes are winded.

Actions.Name: Poison Burst
Actions.Description: The Ruddcap releases a burst of poisonous spores that becomes a close blast 1 area of dangerous terrain that lasts until the hob uses this ability again. Foes that end their turn in the area are poisoned. Poisoned foes are stunned.
